Body.Content:
We're making some changes to the IP lists that need to be added to the allowed list (whitelist) in your organization.

[When this will happen:]

On January 23, 2024, we're updating the IPs listed in Network requirements.

These changes will go into effect late February 2024. 

[How this will affect your organization:]

You are receiving this message as you have a product that requires these IPs whitelisted to ensure the proper running of our service. Failure to update the allowed list (whitelist) in your organization, could result in degradation of service.

[What you need to do to prepare:]

Review the updated list of allowed IP addresses (Network requirements) and make changes as appropriate for your organization.

Title: Configuration Change - Microsoft Defender for Cloud Apps
